tool.name: Stitch Gene blocks
tool.description: given a set of coding exon intervals

validator.message: Input must be in BED12 format.

param.name: overwrite_with_gaps
param.label: Split into Gapless MAF blocks
param.help: When set to Yes, blocks are divided around gaps appearing in any species. This will prevent gaps occurring in the interior of the sequence for an aligning species from overwriting a nucleotide found for the same position in a lower-scoring block.
